meaningMnemonic: When a <radical>shellfish</radical> becomes a <radical>drunkard</radical> and sees a <radical>cross</radical>, they'll become a <kanji>robber</kanji>. Because they'll steal the cross!
readingMnemonic: Once the shellfish has a taste for being a <kanji>robber</kanji>, he'll join a Boso<reading>zoku</reading> (ぞく) bike gang so he can keep stealing more and more crosses. He'll drink more, steal more, and get to ride cool motorcycles.
